message: I understand you wanting to be fair, but I need a bit more to make it worth it for me. How about this?
Considering the inflation, this is a more than fair deal
Okay, let's split it evenly.  It's important to reach an agreement.
Splitting evenly doesn't account for the decreasing value on your end, this is a better compromise
Alice, we need to reach an agreement soon. This offer recognizes the time pressure and gives us both a reasonable deal.
Time pressure affects you more, considering the inflation. This is a fair adjustment
Alice, this is my final offer.  Take it or leave it. We are running out of time, and this is the only way I can justify accepting a deal at this point.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm giving you one more chance to accept a fair deal
